Question: WideOrbit LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
WideOrbit LLC

WO Network 2023

- Precision: Allows properties to define raw impression values from 1(000) thousand to the unit level 1(001) for more accurate CPM calculations and impression accounting.
- Direct Response (DR) Automation (Revisions): Import DR deal changes into existing WO Network Deals, improving efficiency.
- Constraint Instruction Bundle Audit: Adds a new tab within Constraint Instruction Bundles to track changes to bundles.
- Deal Reweight Analysis Report: Extends daypart functionality to support user-defined Client Dayparts instead of Selling Name dayparts.
- Deal Search/Master Deals: Allows users to create Master Deals from an existing group of deals from Deal Search.
- Electronic Material Instructions improvements: Enhancements to streamline electronic material instructions module.

WO Traffic v23.0

- Spot-level order validation
- Streamlined material approvals
- Multi-select for mass import of Material Instructions
- Added process to receive and view lift impressions for ads not replaced on a stream
- Digital Orders enhancements
- Placer conflict and override tools for managing oversell of bookends
- Optional process at log finalization for creating up to 7 days of automation-ready playlist files
- Electronic Material Instructions Trial tool for users to "test drive" the module

For more information on how to upgrade or learn more about these products, contact WideOrbit.
Summary_cn:
WideOrbit LLC（广阔轨道有限责任公司）

WO Network 2023

- 精准定价：允许属性按照从1(000)千到1(001)单位级别定义原始展示值，以实现更准确的CPM计算和展示账务处理。
- 直接响应（DR）自动化（修订版）：将DR交易变更导入现有的WO网络交易中，提高效率。
- 约束指令捆绑审核：在约束指令捆绑中新增一个标签页，用于跟踪捆绑的变更。
- 交易重新加权分析报告：扩展日部分功能，支持用户自定义客户日部分，而不是销售名称日部分。
- 交易搜索/主交易：允许用户从交易搜索中创建主交易的现有交易组。
- 电子资料指令改进：增强了流程，使电子资料指令模块更加高效。

WO Traffic v23.0

- 广告位级别订单验证
- 流程简化的物料批准
- 批量导入物料指令的多选功能
- 添加过程以接收和查看未在流中替换的广告的提升展示量
- 数字订单增强功能
- 处理冲突和覆盖工具，用于管理两端超售问题
- 日志最终化时，可选择的过程用于创建最多7天的可自动化播放列表文件
- 电子资料指令试用工具，供用户“试驾”该模块

要了解更多关于如何升级或深入了解这些产品的信息，请联系广阔轨道。
